title: I'm a 13-year-old Christian boy experiencing same-sex attraction. I grew up in church and love God. I know this is wrong. What is a Christian way I can overcome these emotions? - Quora

response.answer_text: You probably cannot but understand this. 2 things. 1st …Augustin wrote the “ disordered loves" idea. He purposed that evil was here before creation and man cannot create or generate new evil. He purposed that every human desire or (love) came from God who created us in his image. So every sin or evil mankind engages in is basically a misplaced (love) given to us by God. For example man is given the desire to build and create through work. This is a God given (Love). However the Bible is explicit in its message that mankind's purpose is to worship or (love) God above all else. Adam failed loving Eve more than God. Thus our love to work can become sin if it is put above our love of family or God. The struggle of humanity is to correctly order its loves by keeping God first. In your case behind your homosexual desire is a God given Love. Whether it has been warped in human interactions is probably true but it has at its core a God image. The same can be said for a heterosexual man who is married but works with a female he finds intellectually, spiritually and physically attractive. The desire to have relationship with that female cannot be denied it is God given. The married man cannot act on that love because he must put the God love and his wife love above that of his desire for the attractive female. His love and loyalty to God are tested just as yours is. To act towards God as your first love. The temptation and desire that the West has stressed as truth are not truth. The fact you desire this is not a complete truth it is just a small truth for you. Truth is absolute, we are defined by our creator we do not define ourselves. You have a choice to define or get your identity from your desires or to subvert them to your identity in the creator and to Love him first as your supplier of all that you need. Adam failed this test when God was absent in the Garden…he would not Love God first who created Eve but instead put his identity into Eve who gave him a God given pleasure. The creator must define you or something (idol)else will. The only person to beat death is Jesus Christ….all men die…will you trust God the eternal or that which dies.
